title: If you're in a ranked game, please pay attention to champion select chat
body:
If you're in a normal game, ok, I won't hold that against you as much, but in a ranked game, you really should. You can check your Twitter during load screen, because those five minutes when we coordinate roles and picks are crucial to winning the game.

If you're such a busy person that you can't spare the five most important minutes of the game, don't queue up for ranked.
